H0.text: who lives at the end of king lear. Edgar

H1.text: who lives at the end of king lear. Albany

H2.text: who lives at the end of king lear. Cordelia

H3.text: who lives at the end of king lear. Kent

A4.text: Lear carries the dead Cordelia in his arms, before dying of grief.

A5.text: Edgar tricks the suicidal Gloucester into thinking he has survived a leap from the cliffs of Dover.

A6.text: Albany offers to share power: Kent refuses, expecting soon to follow Lear into the grave.

A7.text: Cordelia marries Edgar and becomes ruler of the kingdom.
